param.name: snapshot_id
param.doc: ID of the relevant snapshot. This is an MD5 hash of the snapshot's file name.

method.name: POST
method.doc: To apply a snapshot, issue a HTTP POST command on the Snapshots URI including the snapshot ID. The snapshot ID can be retrieved by using the "Retrieving information about all valid snapshots" API.

request.doc:
POST https://{appliance_hostname}/snapshots/apply/7572b9b2458d5bf1fcfe86a5a4773b0f Content-Type: multipart/form-data
For example, to apply a snapshot using curl:
curl https://10.0.6.23/core/snapshots/apply/7572b9b2458d5bf1fcfe86a5a4773b0f -u admin:admin -X POST

response.doc: Apply operation was started successfully. The LMI will be restarted automatically if required.
This error is returned when the snapshot ID is incorrect or invalid.
